alert.note: Alert for Lorain; Medina; Summit; Wayne (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 23 at 2:18PM EDT until August 23 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Medina County in northeastern Ohio... Southwestern Summit County in northeastern Ohio... Northern Wayne County in northeastern Ohio... Southern Lorain County in north central Ohio... * Until 300 PM EDT. * At 217 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Brunswick to Wellington, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Akron, Medina, Wooster, Brunswick, Barberton, Green, Wadsworth, Orrville, Rittman, Wellington, Doylestown, Lodi, Creston, West Salem, Chippewa Lake, New Franklin, Norton, Seville, Penfield and Smithville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
